excerpt: A delicious plant-based twist on a classic dish

ingredients.name: 1/2 cup canned black beans, drained and rinsed

instructions: Wash the sweet potatoes and pat dry.
Using a fork, pierce the sweet potatoes all around.
Rub olive oil all over the sweet potatoes and sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Place the sweet potatoes on a baking sheet and bake for 40-45 minutes or until tender.
Remove from the oven and let cool for a few minutes.
Cut the sweet potatoes open and top with black beans, avocado slices, and salsa.
